topic.title: Barefooting
topic.body:
Do you like walk barefoot? What are you means about barefoot people on streets?

PS  Thanks for answers.

1564932941_1CHaf5xV3RY8BaoknhfQBNKAYycPw.body:
In order to become free you need  to stop lying to yourself, accept your weakness, and itâ€™s very truthtly to answer the questions - what do you want in life? Why do you need God?

IMHO

> [holeyhouseofair](#comment_49_1CHaf5xV3RY8BaoknhfQBNKAYycPwjjc57): I don't know what my weakness is. I don't like the game of power and constantly talk down my physical urges. I have learned that making others unhappy to make myself happy is unfulfilling and empty. I feel like we are going too far in sacrificing personal liberties and the only ideology that seems to describe the world accurately is the one I have picked up over time.

I want to live in a world where we don't take advantage of one another, where we can live in peace. I don't need god, its just something I've always returned to, I have sinned and been burned again and again, always returning to my inner peace


good ideas, I am not religions fanatik and respect atheism and non religion philosophical theories
